cs.IT, cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SI, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of securing a network coding communication system against a wiretapper adversary, which is a topic that falls under the intersection of information theory (cs.IT) and cryptography (cs.CR). The proposed coding scheme is applicable to any communication network, which suggests that it may also be relevant to networked systems (cs.NI) and security and privacy (cs.SI). Finally, the paper involves the use of codes and coding theory, which is a topic that falls under computer science (cs.CC).
